decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (288-P1.101-J, 288-P1.102-J, 288-P1.106-H, 288-P1.107-H, 288-P1.108-J, 288-P1.109-J, received 08 April 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 01122/56/P1 dated 5.7.13 as the scheme has been built with minor changes made to the approved drawings
